name: Pizza Tower Mod - The Collapsing Challenge (Demo 2 Edition)
name_original: Pizza Tower Mod - The Collapsing Challenge (Demo 2 Edition)
description: Run before the time stops in all 4 levels from Demo 2! Like in the Snick Challenge from SAGE Demo. tbh this was easier to do than i thought. Cover Art made by someone, and also, do not collect toppins.
